resources.string: name text, remoteid text unique not null, selectedlast date, alias text, phone text, office text, title text, company text, email text, type text, mobile text, fax text, fname text, lname text, department text, management text, egal text, street text, city text, state text, postal text, notes text
alter table contactStore add column selectedlast datetime;
create index contactStore_name on contactStore(name);create index contactStore_remoteid on contactStore(remoteid);
